Sentencas: Sulfur-containing odorants are normally added to propane and natural gas supplies to facilitate leak detection.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: The sulfur in these fuels can poison the catalysts used in fuel-cell fuel-processing systems, thereby inactivating the surfaces of the fuel-cell anodes and resulting in degraded power generation performance.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: The sulfur content of natural gas or any hydrocarbon fuel needs to be reduced to very low levels to ensure long-term stable electrochemical performance for both high- and low-temperature fuel cells.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: This paper presents the development and test results of a new physical adsorbent for natural gas desulfurization.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: The sorbent effectively removes all sulfur-bearing compounds at ambient temperature with very high capacity.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: The new sorbent can also be fully regenerated by the temperature swing.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: In a series of tests, the sulfur adsorption capacity of the new material is compared with other commercially available and specially prepared sorbents.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization

Sentencas: The results of the comparison tests are also summarized in this paper.
Titulo: Regenerable sorbent for natural gas desulfurization
